server.name: io.github.antvis/mcp-server-chart
server.description: A Model Context Protocol server for generating charts using AntV.

environmentVariables.description: Custom chart generation service URL for private deployment
environmentVariables.name: VIS_REQUEST_SERVER

environmentVariables.description: Service identifier for chart generation records
environmentVariables.name: SERVICE_ID

environmentVariables.description: Comma-separated list of tool names to disable
environmentVariables.name: DISABLED_TOOLS
